subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo’s 32nd goal of the season led Real Madrid over Atletico Madrid, 1-0, and into the Copa del Rey semifinals for the first time since 2006.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo’s 32nd goal of the season led Real Madrid over Atletico Madrid, 1-0, and into the Copa del Rey semifinals for the first time since 2006.
